p: Fig 4A showed the spatial distribution of high-risk areas or clusters of DF at street-wise. There were 75 high risk streets (RRs ≥ 1) in the southwest of Guangzhou city. These streets were located mostly in Yuexiu, Liwan and Haizhu district, the southern part of Baiyun, the northern part of Panyu, Tianhe and Huangpu district. Fig 4B depicts the sum of daily indigenous DF cases of the streets with RRs <1 and RRs ≥ 1 during the study period.
